author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENZO CONTINUES TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO DISSIPATE LATER THIS WEEK...
summary: ...LORENZO CONTINUES TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO DISSIPATE LATER THIS WEEK... As of 5:00 PM AST Tue Oct 14 the center of Lorenzo was located near 18.7, -45.5 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENZO CONTINUES TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO DISSIPATE LATER THIS WEEK... As of 5:00 PM AST Tue Oct 14 the center of Lorenzo was located near 18.7, -45.5 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorenzo (AT2/AL122025)
